title: Off-Road Racer 3D game for Android
description:
Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=klb.off.road.racer


Off-Road Racer 3D is a classic racing style game where the player goes head to head with other rival racers. Get behind the wheel of your truck and race as fast as you can to beat the AI racers to the finish line. Buy other trucks and buggies, trucks and cars to improve your odds of winning the race and finishing first, thus earning more points which are used to unlock other tracks and vehicles.


Each location has its own charm - from the hot desert, to the icy mountain to the volcanic island - all tracks have their own obstacles and AI controlled opponents with vehicles which will race against you. Can you win all races, become first and unlock new locations and vehicles?


Currently the game has 6 vehicles(2 4x4 trucks, one monster truck, one buggy and two rally cars) and 5 tracks - one in the desert, one in the forest, winter course, beach and island scenes(more cars and tracks to come soon). Each vehicle and location have their unique characteristics and scenery.


Now you can choose between different quality settings for the game, thus making the game available on lower end devices.


Features:

-3D racing game
-2 4x4 trucks, one monster truck, one buggy and two rally cars
-5 tracks with beautiful scenery - desert, winter, forest, beach and island
-Simple and fun controls
-Classic style racing game
-Smart AI opponents, making the game fun and challenging
